alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 7:50PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL MARION AND WEST CENTRAL PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM EDT... At 750 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Orange Springs, or near Interlachen, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Melrose Landing, Orange Springs, Hollister, Hog Valley, Johnson, and Mannville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Putnam
